activities.loc: Courtroom B, Third Floor - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gregory Charles Little

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: 01:35 PM Defendant Gregory Charles Little not in court.  Attorney Steven W. Zaleski appeared by video for Gregory Charles Little.  Prosecuting attorney Emmeline Lee appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Must sign bond by end of day October 28, 2022. Not guilty plea entered by attorney, remand to branch 6 for scheduling.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

10:00 AM Defendant Gregory Charles Little in court.  Attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio and intern Verity Altenberger  appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Signature bond set of $1000.00   with conditions, Cannot operate a motor vehicle during pendency of case without valid drivers license or without valid insurance and registration. Matter continued to allow defendant time to obtain an attorney.  Adjourned initial appearance October 19, 2022 at 1:00 pm.
Notice of Hearing for Initial Appearance on October 4, 2022 at 10:00am with Criminal Complaint, NOT DELIVERABLE AS ADDRESSED, UNABLE TO FORWARD, RETURN TO SENDER (Defendant Gregory Charles Little)
Cannot operate a motor vehicle during pendency of case without valid drivers license or without valid insurance or registration.
Initial appearance on October 4, 2022 at 10:00 am.
